trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Out-Host
trans-unit.target: Out-Host

trans-unit.source: Out-Host
trans-unit.target: Out-Host

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Sends output to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 將輸出傳送至命令列。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Out-Host** cmdlet sends output to the Windows PowerShell host for display.
trans-unit.target: **Out-host** 指令程式會將輸出傳送至 Windows PowerShell 主機來顯示。

trans-unit.source: The host displays the output at the command line.
trans-unit.target: 主機會在命令列中顯示輸出。

trans-unit.source: Because **Out-Host** is the default, you do not have to specify it unless you want to use its parameters to change the display.
trans-unit.target: 因為 **Out-host** 是預設值，您沒有指定它，除非您想要使用自己的參數來變更顯示。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Display system processes one page at a time
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 一次顯示系統處理程序一頁

trans-unit.source: This command displays the processes on the system one page at a time.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會一次顯示一頁在系統上的處理程序。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Get-Process cmdlet to get the processes on the system.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 Get-process cmdlet 取得系統上的處理程序。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator sends the results to **Out-Host**, which displays them at the console.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子將結果傳送到 **Out-host**, ，以在主控台上顯示。

trans-unit.source: The *Paging* parameter displays one page of data at a time.
trans-unit.target: *分頁* 參數一次顯示一頁的資料。

trans-unit.source: The same command format is used for the Help function that is built into Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 內建的 Help 函式使用相同的命令格式。

trans-unit.source: That function gets data from the Get-Help cmdlet and then uses the *Paging* parameter of **Out-Host** to display the data one page at a time by using this command format: `Get-Help $Args\[0\] | Out-Host -Paging`.
trans-unit.target: 函式從 Get-help cmdlet 取得資料，並接著使用 *分頁* 參數 **Out-host** 來一次顯示一個頁面的資料，使用下列命令格式︰ `Get-Help $Args\[0\] | Out-Host -Paging`。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Display session history
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 顯示工作階段歷程記錄

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the Get-History cmdlet to get the session history, and then it stores the history in the $a variable.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用 Get-history cmdlet 取得工作階段歷程記錄，然後在 $a 變數中儲存歷程記錄。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses **Out-Host** to display the content of the $a variable, and it uses the *InputObject* parameter to specify the variable to **Out-Host**.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令會使用 **Out-host** 來顯示內容的變數，並使用的 $ *InputObject* 參數來指定變數 **Out-host**。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the objects that are written to the console.
trans-unit.target: 指定寫入主控台的物件。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains the objects, or type a command or expression that gets the objects.
trans-unit.target: 輸入包含物件的變數，或輸入可取得物件的命令或運算式。

trans-unit.source: -Paging
trans-unit.target: 分頁

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet displays one page of output at a time, and waits for user input before it displays the remaining pages, much like the traditional **more** command.
trans-unit.target: 指出這個指令程式會一次一頁的輸出，並等候使用者輸入，然後再顯示其餘的頁面，非常類似傳統 **詳細** 命令。

trans-unit.source: By default, all of the output is displayed on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，所有輸出會顯示在單一頁面上。

trans-unit.source: The page size is determined by the characteristics of the host.
trans-unit.target: 頁面大小取決於主機特性。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSObject
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSObject

trans-unit.source: You can pipe any object to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送到此指令程式的任何物件。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: However, the host might display the objects that **Out-Host** sends to it.
trans-unit.target: 不過，主機可能會顯示物件的 **Out-host** 將傳送給它。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: The cmdlets that contain the **Out** verb (the **Out** cmdlets) do not format objects.
trans-unit.target: 包含的 cmdlet **出** 動詞命令 ( **出** cmdlet) 不會格式化物件。

trans-unit.source: They just render objects and send them to the specified display destination.
trans-unit.target: 只會轉譯物件並將它們傳送至指定的顯示目的地。

trans-unit.source: If you send an unformatted object to an **Out** cmdlet, the cmdlet sends it to a formatting cmdlet before rendering it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您傳送至未格式化的物件 **出** cmdlet，此指令程式將它傳送到格式化 cmdlet 才能呈現。

trans-unit.source: The **Out** cmdlets do not have parameters for names or file paths.
trans-unit.target: **出** cmdlet 沒有任何參數的名稱或檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: To send data to an **Out** cmdlet, use a pipeline operator (|) to send the output of a Windows PowerShell command to the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要將資料傳送給 **出** 指令程式，使用管線運算子 (|) 將 Windows PowerShell 命令的輸出傳送至 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: You can also store data in a variable and use the *InputObject* parameter to pass the data to the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 也可以將資料儲存在變數中並使用在 *InputObject* 將資料傳遞給 cmdlet 的參數。

trans-unit.source: For help, see the examples.
trans-unit.target: 如需說明，請參閱範例。

trans-unit.source: **Out-Host** sends data, but it does not emit any output objects.
trans-unit.target: **Out-host** 傳送資料，但它不會發出任何輸出物件。

trans-unit.source: If you pipe the output of **Out-Host** to the Get-Member cmdlet, **Get-Member** reports that no objects have been specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用管線傳送的輸出 **Out-host** Get-member 指令程式， **Get-member** 報告尚未指定任何物件。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: Out-printer
